women, what's the most infuriating thing you've had mansplained to you?

Last week on Twitter, Tracy Clayton (@brokeymcpoverty) asked a good question—"women, what's the most infuriating thing you've had mansplained to you?" She got thousands of answers—so many, that it's hard to see how many through the regular Twitter interfaces. I wanted to get a better feel for all the answers.

Using some power tools and custom scripting, I pulled together replies from the 72 hours after Tracy's tweet. Presented below are more than 5,000 tweets by more than 4,000 authors.

There were many more replies than that, but I tried to weed out conversation about the question and answers, and tweets by men, to get mostly straight-up replies to the question, by women. I did this semi-automatically, and I am sure that I have failed, and tweets that don't fit are included—and likely, some great answers were left out. Please DM me on Twitter if you see changes that need to be made, or if you want your tweets removed from the list. Also not included: any tweets with images (such as reaction gifs)—mostly to make this page easier to present.

The tweets are sorted chronologically, grouped by each author under their first tweet.

- Peter Kaminski (@peterkaminski), 2017-03-26

@brokeymcpoverty
women, what's the most infuriating thing you've had mansplained to you?
